title: how to quit league
body:
Have you ever thought about leaving this game? Just not playing it altogether? One day, you uninstall. But you go to somewhere like Instagram and you see a nice, flashy skin on your explore and you reinstall league in no hesitation. But how do you quit League entirely?

The simple answer is:

**FIND SOMETHING ELSE TO DO**

It could be anything from playing another videogame, playing a sport, going out w your mates, anything to fill the gap that League left behind. If you dont want to uninstall League, just hide the game in some dark faraway folder and find something else to do.

Then begin avoiding everything related to League. Websites, pages etc... just ignore them. Unfollow them. Dont look at them. Block them, idk. Dont view anything related to League. If your friends play League and they bring it up, change subject asap. 

The main reason I quit League is because I lost interest, the games were getting repetitive and stale and so on. In the first few weeks it was hard but in a month or two you will forget this game even exists.

I recently went back to League to just check it out. But even though I enjoyed Odyssey:Extraction a lot, normal SR games felt dull and I definetly can say that I dont enjoy League as good as before.

I also started playing DoTa recently(dont call me an apostate)and I'm not one of those people who promotes HoTs at every Youtube section, but League, for some of us has begun feeling less enjoyable and this method to quit, if done right, will work on anyone all the time.


PS:I don't play F****ite. You should NOT as well.
